content.name: Dropships
content.description: Add's new variants of the M frigates for all races that operate as dropships.
content.author: Tumor

text.name: Dropships
text.description: Add's new variants of the M frigates for all races that operate as dropships. They're not as well suited to combat, but they have increased crew capacities so they can serve as early boarding craft. A viable option for the budding pirate or privateer that doesn't require you dropping 15m credits on a freighter just so you can get enough marines to board a Pheonix.
text.author: Tumor
